tddt.backup

Class Backup

  • java.lang.Object
    • tddt.backup.Backup

  • public class Backup
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to save the version of the code when the babysteps timer is active. After the time has run out, the code in the text area will be reset to the backup code. Class usage: Backup creation:
    See Also:
    Create backup once an exercise is loaded., Create a new backup once the phase is switched Reset to backup:, Reset to backup if babysteps is turned on and the time has run out, Reset to backup if you go to previous phase

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String inhalt 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Backup()
      The constructor creates a backup object which contains the backup String.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getLastBackup()
      The getLastBackup class is used to get the String contained in the current Backup object
      void setNewBackup(java.lang.String a)
      The setNewBackup method is used to store a new String in the Backup object
